titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter from the Earle of Essex, by order of the pretended Houses of Parliament, to Prince Rupert with His Highnesse answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.
Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
